about_the_game:
You’re the Overlord of the kingdom’s most infamous dungeon and you’ve seen countless heroes face your creation, only to fail in the end. Now you’re running out of patience: it’s time to help out those who will dare venture into your dungeon, hoping someone will manage to get to the end and not find out the reason behind your sudden…kindness.

The Good Overlord is a roguelike “Bag-Builder” in which you will have to position your monsters and traps in a strategic way in order to guide the hero through your dungeon. The hero will have to face impressive enemies, interact with “friendly” faces and investigate the dungeon’s secrets, which only you, the mighty Overlord, jealously treasure.

Key Features

  • Build your monster pool by selecting between more than 50 different enemies, to create the worst combination possible.
  • Collect relics and objects that will allow you to upgrade the hero and his abilities.
  • Interact with the dungeon’s inhabitants which will all help you in different and surprising ways, for the right price, of course.
  • Explore the infinite possibilities of synergy between your monsters and help the hero conquer the dungeon.



But "The Good Overlord" is much more than that:
discover the reasons behind the Overlord's benevolence, explore the countless possibilities for synergy among your monsters, and help the hero conquer the dungeon.
